title: Aging population increases demand for health care

content.question: As the population of a country ages, the demand for health care is projected to increase. As a result, the health care industry is likely to experience all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: an increase in demand for health care workers
an increase in demand for medicine
an increase in the quantity of health care workers supplied
an increase in the wages of health care workers
a decrease in the prices of medicine

content.answer: a decrease in the prices of medicine

topic.text: 5.2: Changes in Factor Demand and Factor Supply

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
